wavesongs.model#

Submodules#

wavesongs.model.bird module#

Motor gesture implementation for birdsongs

wavesongs.model.bird.alpha_beta(obj: Any, z: Dict = {'a0': 0.11, 'b0': -0.1, 'b1': 1, 'b2': 0}, method: Literal['best', 'fast'] = 'best') → List[Buffer | _SupportsArray[dtype[Any]] | _NestedSequence[_SupportsArray[dtype[Any]]] | bool | int | float | complex | str | bytes | _NestedSequence[bool | int | float | complex | str | bytes]][source]#
Parameters:

  • obj (Song | Syllable)

  • z (dict)

Returns:

  • alpha (np.array([1,2…N])) – Bronchis pressure

  • beta (np.array())

Example

>>>
wavesongs.model.bird.f1(x, y, alpha, beta, gamma)#

Created with lambdify. Signature:

func(x, y, alpha, beta, gamma)

Expression:

y

Source code:

def _lambdifygenerated(x, y, alpha, beta, gamma):

return y

Imported modules:

wavesongs.model.bird.f2(x, y, alpha, beta, gamma)#

Created with lambdify. Signature:

func(x, y, alpha, beta, gamma)

Expression:

gamma**2*(-alpha - beta*x - x**3 + x**2) - gamma*x*y*(x + 1)

Source code:

def _lambdifygenerated(x, y, alpha, beta, gamma):

return gamma**2*(-alpha - beta*x - x**3 + x**2) - gamma*x*y*(x + 1)

Imported modules:

wavesongs.model.bird.motor_gestures(obj: Any, curves: List[Buffer | _SupportsArray[dtype[Any]] | _NestedSequence[_SupportsArray[dtype[Any]]] | bool | int | float | complex | str | bytes | _NestedSequence[bool | int | float | complex | str | bytes]], params: Dict = {'C': 343, 'Ch': 1.43e-10, 'L': 0.025, 'MB': 10000.0, 'MG': 20, 'RB': 5000000.0, 'Rh': 24000.0, 'gm': 40000.0, 'r': 0.65}) → Any[source]#
Parameters:

pramams (Dict)

Returns:

synth – Synthethic syllable with same parameters except for s and vs

Return type:

Syllable

Example

>>>
